page.title: 15LEISURE TIME AT HOME
page.content: Most local houses have gardens; some are children's play areas, others grow fruit and vegetables as well as flowers, shrubs and trees. Greenhouses ponds,and patios often enhance the garden. Pets range from dogs, cats, rabbits, guinea pigs to exotic birds and snakes. A small but enthusiastic group is involved with horses and riding. Indoors most families have radios, television sets and cassette players. Various musical instruments, books boardgames,table games, jigsaws and modelling provide interest for leisure hours.
